title: Project Tax on Roth Conversion
description: A taxpayer wants to convert a portion of their traditional IRA to a Roth IRA and needs to know the tax cost.

tasks.description: Determine the amount the taxpayer wishes to convert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the conversion amount from the client.

tasks.description: Explain that the converted amount will be treated as taxable income in the current year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the tax implications.

tasks.description: Calculate the additional income tax that will be due as a result of the conversion based on the taxpayer's marginal tax rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a precise estimate of the tax cost of the conversion.
